segments.text: Oh man, look at that sink overflowing like crazy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring out everywhere, soaking the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, polishing that plate without a clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress look so proper, but her foot's in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't heard the water splashing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, those kids over by the cabinets are up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that stool, reaching into the cookie jar like a pro thief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool's tilting back, he could fall any minute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's right there, hand out, begging for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so sneaky, thinking the mom's not watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, all calm and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes the mess inside stand out even more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off that faucet before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just asking for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
